Package org.nlpub.watset.util

Class Neighbors

java.lang.Object
org.nlpub.watset.util.Neighbors
public final class Neighbors
extends Object
Utilities for extracting neighborhood graphs and iterating over them.

    • graph

      public static <V,​ E> org.jgrapht.Graph<V,​E> graph​(org.jgrapht.Graph<V,​E> graph, V node)
      Extract the neighborhood graph for the given node.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of nodes in the graph
      E - the type of edges in the graph
      Parameters:
      graph - the graph
      node - the target node
      Returns:
      a neighborhood of node
